incubator-tamaya_022b15e.message: TAMAYA-42 avoid NPE and add TODOs

incubator-tamaya_e977ab2.message:
EnumConverter works with null values

Previously, EnumConverter would throw an NPE if passed a null value, but
only because of an attempted .toUpperCase() which didn't get caught.
This commit now passes null values through instead of throwing NPE.

incubator-tamaya_930eb1a.message: Fix for NPE, when only one service instance is available in some cases.

incubator-tamaya_a03615f.message: TAMAYA-145: Fixed NPE on cascaded filters and mappings.

incubator-tamaya_88c99a1.message: TAMAYA-116: Fixed NPE and test issues (using Weld by default, instead of OWB).

file.patch:

                 <!-- OWB specific dependencies-->
                 <dependency>
